item.title: Sims ain’t all about that WooHoo
item.author: Felix Editor,John Norrie,
item.description: The games section of a newspaper can be a tough environment for flourishing writers, what with the challenge of finding entertaining topics or games that people are familiar with However I think I would be hard pressed to find a person who hasn’t heard of The Sims. The Sims, for those of you who …
